data.title: Management, concert, festival, private shows
data.meta_description: booking, management artist OMARION for concert, festival, private show, clubs shows, worldwide
data.text:
In 2001, Omarion became the lead singer of the hip hop / R & B boy band B2K. The band released their debut album, B2K, but saw more success with their second, Pandemonium, which ranked in the top 10 on the Billboard 200, giving them their first # 1 spot with Bump Bump Bump. After their third album, the soundtrack to the film Street Dancers, B2K announces its separation.

About a year later, Omarion released his first solo album, O. The same year, he appeared as a guest on Lil 'Bow Wow's song Let Me Hold You which was ranked number 4 on the Billboard Hot 100: it was the first Omarion single ranked in the top 10 as a solo artist.

In December 2006, Omarion released their second album, 21. Entourage, the album's debut single, reaching No. 58 on the Billboard Hot 100.

The second single, Ice Box, became his biggest hit until 2008, being ranked number 12 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart.

Omarion Booking, Book Omarion, Book artists like Omarion, Omarion booking agent, contact Omarion email, ​ Omarion manager, Omarion management for concerts, bookings, ​ Omarion biography, ​ Omarion pictures, ​ Omarion videos. ​ Omarion may be available for your club shows, private party, festivals or other events.
